sentences.cn: " 两个月, "思嘉不大情愿地说.

sentences.en: But the bride also unwillingly shows weakness , rises spiritedly to attack.
sentences.cn: 而新娘也不甘示弱,奋起反击.

sentences.en: Even when I call, he receives unwillingly.
sentences.cn: 即使我登门拜访, 他也是很不情愿地接待我.

sentences.en: He submitted unwillingly to his mother.
sentences.cn: 他不情愿地屈服于他母亲.

sentences.en: It is well to be reminded that Gandhi started out with the normal ambitions of a young Indian student and only adopted his extremist opinions by degrees and, in some cases, rather unwillingly.
sentences.cn: 值得一提的是，甘地起初抱得是印度青年学生的正常的雄心，只是逐渐采用了他的那些偏激的思想，在某些情况下还相当不情愿。

sentences.en: My beard had started to grow, and I had unwillingly complied with the order to shave it off.
sentences.cn: 我的胡子开始长出来，而我不得不服从命令把胡子刮掉。

sentences.en: She laughed unwillingly, and the laughing reflection under the green brim decided her instantly.
sentences.cn: "她勉强笑笑,可是一起见镜子里那绿帽檐底下的笑影便立即下决心了.

sentences.en: Their parents unwillingly [ grudgingly ] consented to the marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母无可奈何地应允了这门亲事.

sentences.en: There are few things that we so unwillingly give up, even in advanced age.
sentences.cn: 即使在年老时,我们也不情愿放弃什么东西.

sentences.en: To say that Jon Forsyte accompanied his mother to Spain unwillingly would scarcely have been adequate.
sentences.cn: 要说乔恩·福尔赛不愿意随母亲上西班牙去,那是一点不正确的.

sentences.en: Unwillingly Ralph turned away from the splendid , awful sight.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫勉强地转过身来, 还留恋着既光彩夺目又令人畏惧的景象.

sentences.en: Unwillingly she met his eyes, defiance and perturbation on her face.
sentences.cn: 她极不情愿地看着他的眼睛, 满脸反抗和烦乱的神色.
她很不情愿地挪到一边。

sentences.en: Very unwillingly Charles saw that he must give the order to retreat.
sentences.cn: 查理看到,他不得不违心地下令撤军了.

sentences.en: When it was time to go, they left unwillingly.
sentences.cn: 起程回校的时候到了, 大家都有些依依不舍.

words.tran_cn: 不愿意的；不情愿的；勉强的

trans.tran_cn: 不情愿地，勉强地，勉勉强强
